scripts.deploy-s3: npm run build && cross-env S3_BUCKET_NAME=${S3_BUCKET_NAME} npm run s3-sync
scripts.s3-sync: aws s3 sync ./out s3://${S3_BUCKET_NAME}/ --delete --cache-control 'max-age=31536000' && aws s3 cp ./out/index.html s3://${S3_BUCKET_NAME}/index.html --cache-control 'max-age=0, no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate' --content-type 'text/html'
